page.title: 02EDUCATION
page.content: There is no pre_school provision within this area. The nearest nursery is in St.Andrews 7 miles away. Primary education takes place within a two roomed building in the centre of the area. The roll of the school is 9 children. The teaching staff comprises one full time and one part time teacher. The school is likely to close in July 1985. The children will probably transfer to Largoward,2 miles away,or New Gilston,2.5 miles. All children except 1 are transported either by parents or minibus to school. Secondary Education takes place in St.Andrews at Madras College children being transported by bus.
